name: Acne Vulgaris
description: A chronic inflammatory skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells. It is characterized by lesions like pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, and deeper lumps (cysts or nodules), primarily on the face, neck, chest, back, and shoulders.
symptoms: Nodules (large, solid, painful lumps under skin)
Cystic lesions (painful, pus-filled lumps under skin)

early_stage.description: Mild acne consisting mainly of comedones (blackheads and whiteheads) with a few scattered papules. Excess oiliness may be present.

middle_stage.description: Moderate acne with a greater number of inflamed papules and pustules covering more skin area. Mild scarring may begin to appear.

advanced_stage.description: Severe nodulocystic acne characterized by deep, painful cysts and nodules. High risk of permanent scarring and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation.

causes: Acne is caused by a combination of factors: excess oil (sebum) production, hair follicles clogged by oil and dead skin cells, bacteria (Cutibacterium acnes), and inflammation.

favorable_conditions.humidity: High humidity can increase oil production
favorable_conditions.environment: Exposure to greasy or oily substances, pollution

impact.prevalence: Affects approx. 85% of people between ages 12 and 24
impact.socio_economic_impact: Significant psychological impact, including anxiety, depression, and low self-esteem; costs associated with skincare and dermatological treatments.

diagnosis.field_diagnosis: Visual examination of the skin lesions
diagnosis.laboratory_diagnosis: Rarely needed; microbial culture if resistant to antibiotics; hormonal profiling for females with signs of hyperandrogenism.

prevention: Wash face gently twice a day
susceptible_populations: Adolescents (puberty), Pregnant women (hormonal changes), Individuals with family history.
life_cycle: Adolescent acne often starts at puberty and may resolve by early 20s. Adult acne can persist or onset later in life.

dataset_metadata.intended_use: Machine learning training, research, and educational purpose
